meanings.definition: Superlative form of dash, meaning having the most dash or style.
meanings.sent1: She wore the dashiest dress at the party, everyone admired her style.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the outfits, hers was the dashiest and caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: Her cat decided to be the dashiest in the house by wearing a tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the dashiest hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: His car was the dashiest on the street, with its sleek design and shiny rims.
